name: shawnsmithdev
body:
### About
I'm just really, really lazy, so I'm going to use Github's auto-website generator to document the process
while I try to set up an IPv6 and gigabit capable router in Ubuntu Server.  I might write some custom
admin tools in Go / angular for things like port forwarding and network monitoring.

We'll see how long this lasts.

### Code examples
As you can see I'll be able to write up my code here and it will look pretty nice!
```go
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
	fmt.Println("Hello, 世界")
}
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
